topic: Mechanisms and consequences of intramolecular C-H bond activation in the deactivation of supported alkene polymerization and metathesis catalysts, with emphasis on lanthanide/actinide-based and silica-supported Re-based systems
QuestionEnglish: Analyze the role of intramolecular C-H bond activation in the deactivation of supported alkene polymerization and metathesis catalysts, comparing the specific mechanisms involved for lanthanide/actinide-based and silica-supported Re-based catalysts. Discuss the key steps in these processes, including the formation of π-allyl surface complexes and β-H transfer, and evaluate the potential consequences of these deactivation pathways on catalyst performance and longevity.
QuestionChinese: 分析分子内C-H键活化在负载型烯烃聚合和复分解催化剂失活中的作用，比较镧系/锕系基和硅胶负载Re基催化剂所涉及的具体机制。讨论这些过程中的关键步骤，包括π-烯丙基表面络合物的形成和β-H转移，并评估这些失活途径对催化剂性能和寿命的潜在影响。
